definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: He promised to stop selling smuggled goods.
sentences.chinese: 他保證以後不再賣水貨了。

sentences.english: When inquired about the reason, an employee whispered that the iPhones are Hong Kong licensed and procured through the gray market.
sentences.chinese: 當詢問原因時，一名僱員低聲說這是從香港買的水貨。

sentences.english: In four seasons with Cleveland, Diop was deemed a bust.
sentences.chinese: 在克里夫蘭的4個賽季，迪奧普被視作水貨。

sentences.english: Grey-market perfumes and toiletries are now commonly sold by mail.
sentences.chinese: 水貨香水和化妝品現在常常通過郵購方式售賣。

sentences.english: When an exam is too difficult , it " kills " the good as well as the bad.
sentences.chinese: 當試題是太困難的，好生水貨一同受害。

sentences.english: Also known as the absolutely horrendous first overall pick by MJ when he was GM for the Wizards.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道布朗是喬丹當奇才總經理時選的水貨狀元。

sentences.english: Gray market sales of Apple products in China are difficult to track, she said.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果產品銷售是否受水貨蘋果產品影響很難估計。

sentences.english: Is this cellular phone smuggled or Korea made?
sentences.chinese: 這部手機是水貨還是韓貨？

definition: Fengze district of Quanzhou city 泉州市[Quan2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to bargain/to cut or beat down a price
